results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is a prime whose binary expansion encodes a (0,1)-polynomial which is irreducible when factored over GF(2), 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences operating on GF(2)[X]-polynomials
